Key Match Events: Rishabh Pant was castled by Ali Khan
Suryakumar Yadav picked Shadley van Schalkwyk's medium pace for a lofted six over extra cover and a trademark flick over his shoulder for four off back-to-back deliveries
Shivam Dube dug out a yorker-length delivery to long-off to score the winning runs
Pre-Game Insights: India's fourth game at Nassau County Stadium
Monank Patel, the designated captain, was out injured
Rohit Sharma called correctly and asked USA to bat in seaming conditions
A motley crew with day jobs against cricketing royalty
Post-Match Reflections: India are now through to the Super Eights
USA are still very much masters of their own fate; a win over Ireland, even a washout, will see them through, ahead of Pakistan whom they famously beat in a Super Over thriller last week
Miscellaneous Highlights: Suryakumar Yadav bailed India out of choppy waters
Saurabh Netravalkar shelled a chance to hand Suryakumar Yadav a vital life
Aaron Jones was switching fields every ball, running up to have a chat between deliveries, all of it playing into the hands of the batters
Others: Before today, they'd never played at Nassau County Stadium
India won by seven wickets with 10 balls remaining
Shashank Kishore is a senior sub-editor at ESPNcricinfo
